about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Parasight: Chlorophyll worms!

Parasight is a 2D Action-RPG game with souls-like mechanisms.
In this game, you will play as a little girl who wants to save herself from a dangerous biological virus, but she faces various difficulties and hardships in her journey.


*-- Summary --*
Far away in the galaxy, there was an Earth-like planet called Velasterham. The story begins in a quiet-peaceful country named Bonrham that was created by united 40 cities.
everyone's Life was simple and sweet. In a large old house, a girl and her family lived. On a normal sunny day, she goes out of the city to see her friend and play with him.
After a lovely day, when they wanted to back home, suddenly they saw a strange plant! After that, The life of the girl turns upside down.
Seems like a virus spreading in Bonrham, we call it...



*-- Gameplay --*
- Classes -The style used in the game is souls-like. there are 6 unique classes that each one has special powers.

*Knight: Tough strong fighter with shiny armors and powerful damage, master of great weapons.
*Mage: The magic brawler, Casting mighty magic and frozen spells from far away to deal with enemies, but is frail in close combats.
*Priestess: The holy warrior, With the high amount of Hp, can cast holy spells to heal self or cast lightning spells to deal bone-breaker damages.
*Witch: Warrior of darkens, master in casting dark magic that ignores armors, or flame spells that can burn the soul of the enemies,
but Dark and the flame spell has consequences, like draining Health!
*Thief: Blinding speed fighter, light, quick and fast, use both hands in fighting and can deal a lot of damage in just a second.
*Ranger: Ranged fighting fighter, Slash the skins of enemies with whips, masters in using any ranged weapons, also has a special unique bow that works without physical ammunition.


- Features -
-Unique art and soundtrack.

-More than 250 battle items!
Includes swords, axes, staves, bows, shields and etc.

* There are two types of currency *
1-Energy extract: Only can be obtained by Killing enemies, or by injection with energy syringes.
2-Clay coin: Can be obtained by doing tasks, or looting.
-Vanquish enemies, gain ENERGY EXTRACTS, and Level up to become stronger in dealing with your enemies.
-Spend Clay coin, buy new items like weapons, armors, rings consumables, and many more to help you and make your fights easier.

* Play with your satisfying techniques! *
-Wear heavy armor and use weighty weapons and crush your enemies, while you don't feel any pain upon taking damage,
-or wear light armors, use a quick weapon like daggers and dance your blades in the face of your enemies,
-or use ranged weapons to suffer your enemies without any danger, or fight with the magic spells will you breaking their scale and armors!
-Also there are flavor items that can help you in battle, like consumables and rings that increase your ability in various things.
-Explore the vast Bonrham cities, talk to people and listen to their stories, discover cool secrets and items... or you can just ignore them, killing everyone and finding your way out...
-And finally, test your IQ and try to solve the tasks of Tefras and guide your way to your unpredictable fate!
